price: Na hakika yeye mwenyewe bila ya shaka ni shahidi wa hayo!
footnotes: Na hakika yeye mwenyewe bila ya shaka atakuwa mwingi wa kuja jishuhudia huko Akhera kwa kuungama madhambi yake.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
